fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-You will heal all your visitors that night and gain basic defense
-Anyone who doesnâ€™t visit you is marked.
-After alerting, attack up to 3 marked players a night at random until there are no more
-This is mechanically a Town role in every way except for win condition

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Make the good faction lose (May win while dead)
